tool_description: Extracts and structures text content from PDF documents, handling academic papers with sections, abstracts, and references.

pdf_path.description: File path to the PDF document

extract_sections.description: Whether to identify and separate document sections

error_messages: File not found: The specified PDF path does not exist or is inaccessible.
Invalid PDF format: The file is corrupted or not a valid PDF document.
Invalid page range: start_page must be <= end_page and within document bounds.
Extraction failed: Unable to extract text due to PDF protection or encoding issues.
Empty document: The PDF contains no extractable text content.
usage: Provide pdf_path to the document. Optionally set extract_sections to true for structured extraction or specify page_range to extract only certain pages.

word_count.description: Total word count of extracted text
